EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_ScalingDataServicesWithPivotalGemFire_eBook_Q417.Down
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Scaling Data Services with Pivotal GemFire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Scaling Data Services with Pivotal GemFire eBook. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore the benefits of a data layered microservices architecture.
Given your interest in this eBook, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- GemFire Videos: Introduction to Pivotal GemFire Features <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q52QlWkdFgE&list=PLAdzTan_eSPTDAtE3PFJkwoO7jAQ_5lPr]]>
- Data Sheet: Pivotal GemFire: The Scale-Out, In-Memory Distributed Data Grid for Mission-Critical Applications <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-gemfire/pivotal-gemfire]]>
- Geode: How-To Series <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL62pIycqXx-RbKoMA9_QQ_0Wh64AwMdLK]]>
- Training: Pivotal GemFire Developer Training <[[https://www.pluralsight.com/courses/gemfire-developer-pivotal]]>
- Try GemFire on AWS Marketplace <[[https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/search/results?searchTerms=GemFire]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
